subject: Apply active Look's filters/overlay to newly added images
body:
When a Look is selected before images are added, addImage now checks
for activeStylePreset and applies the look's imageFilters and
imageOverlay to the new image instead of using bare defaults.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01HhBnVdU38FjAWWKWvP75DR
title: Apply active Look's filters/overlay to newly added images
